name: Hotronic Heat XLP One Heat Sock Set - Unisex
categories: Heat XLP One Heat Sock Set
description: Get happy feet! Skiers and cold weather commuters will love these heated socks. Chemical warmers last only a few hours but these socks can last all day thanks to the rechargable lithium-ion batteries (one for each foot). Heat settings let you control the warmth and when it's bitterly cold, hit the boost setting for 3 minutes of high temperature bliss.Socks are made nylon, spandex and merino wool that provides good moisture wicking and light compression.Integrated heating elements deliver consistent heat to the lower leg and feet.Lightweight lithium-ion battery packs attach to socks cuffs, where they are out of the way of boot tops.3 heat settings allow you to customize the warmth. A bonus boost mode lets you up the heat for 3 minutes.Includes a wall charger with charge indicator.Unisex sizes: Small fits Mens 4-6, Women's 5-7. Medium fits Mens 7-8, Women's 8-9. Large fits Mens 9-10, Women's 10-11. XL fits Mens 11-13.Replacement socks are available.
